Observed at: North East Margaree 9:00 AM ADT Friday 28 April 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: WNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 28 April 2023
